violent protests. Sally Hunt , general secretary of the University and College Union( UCU) accused the coalition of "sneaking" the student loan rate changes out in the bill. She said: The general public can see this for what it is- a stealth tax on learning and achievement- and it doesn't matter what piece of legislation the Government tries to hide it in. Graduate unemployment is at a 10-year high, yet the Government has introduced policies to increase student debt to record levels and then charge even higher rates of interest. Surely even they will now stop trying to spin these damaging unfair policies as progressive. Further measures included in the White Paper were plans to overhaul the teacher training process, sweeping reforms of qualifications and the introduction of a reading test for six-year-olds. another presidential bid. He told Mr. David Letterman he had "no plans for that at this point," but added, "I'll keep the door open." He told CNN's Mr. Piers Morgan that there are things you've got to assess before you make a final decision. The story goes on to quote an unnamed "Republican lobbyist" saying, If we all agree the battle's going to be won in the middle, Mike Pence is not your guy... I've literally never heard a bad thing about him. People like him, both personally and professionally. But is this the year we're going to elect an ideologue?
